title: The configuration for an MQTT server
description: Defines the connection information for an MQTT server that will receive trigger notifications.

uri.description: The uri of the MQTT server.

rejectUnauthorized.description: Controls whether connections to mqtts:// servers should allow self-signed certificates. Set to false if your MQTT certificates are self-signed and are getting connection errors.

statusTopic.description: Topic status messages are published to.
